    • Uses of Node in avdta.sav

      Subclasses of Node in avdta.sav 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SAVDest
      The SAVDest is like a normal centroid except that it creates an event when SAVs arrive at the destination.
      class  SAVOrigin
      This is the origin version of a centroid for SAVs.
      class  SAVZone
      This class modifies normal Zone behavior to reflect SAVs: SAVs may stay parked at Zones for longer.
      Constructor parameters in avdta.sav with type arguments of type Node
